acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped double values with @PodamDoubleValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleDoubleValuesWithThePodamDoubleValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.DoubleValuePojo

Then the Object DoubleRangeValuesPojo ( doubleFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0.0 doubleFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 26.054241598455746 doubleFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 956.4517976142308 doubleFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245 doubleObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0.0 doubleObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 86.19928081558908 doubleObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 803.5420467064918 doubleObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245 ) should not be null
Then the double value (0} should be greater or equal than 0.0
Then the double value 26.054241598455746 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the double value 956.4517976142308 should be between 0.0 and 1000.0
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
Then the Object 10.1245 should not be null
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
